title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the tables and columns in the tree are loaded immediately upon opening the JDBC Data Set Editor.
EB: The loading of tables and columns should be deferred until the user either expands the tree or applies a filter. This will enhance performance and responsiveness.
SR:
1. Open JDBC Data Set Editor for a SQL Query.
2. Observe that the tables and columns are loaded automatically.
3. Expected: Loading should occur only when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
